content.new:
With the latest `tunnel_circuit` code or [Docker image](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupDockerhub), teams can now use the `/subt/pose_from_artifact_origin` service in the staging area to get the robot location relative to the tunnel entrance and be able to enter the tunnel at the start on the competition faster. This WIP [document](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/CustomControl) has a short example showing how to find the entrance. Please post questions or comments here.

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/3007769966-newt_origin_pos.png)
‌

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/919392519-entertunnel_opt.gif)
content.old:
With the latest `tunnel_circuit` code or [Docker image](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupDockerhub), teams can now use the `/subt/pose_from_artifact_origin` service in the staging area to get the robot&~~#39~~;s location relative to the tunnel entrance and be able to enter the tunnel at the start on the competition faster. This WIP [document](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/CustomControl) has a short example showing how to find the entrance. Please post questions or comments here.

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/3007769966-newt_origin_pos.png)
‌

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/919392519-entertunnel_opt.gif)

issue.title: *** Artifact origin moved to the center of tunnel entrance ***
